revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Squirtbottle |image = [[File:Squirtbottle.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Squirtbottle''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Goldenrod City in [[Johto]] for 5,000 {{farmpoints}}) |effect = Increases the chance of [[Berry|berry]] mutations }} The '''Squirtbottle''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of [[Berry|mutations]] occurring in the [[Farm]]. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Johto]] Berry Master in Goldenrod City. It also requires [[Farming Points]] to upgrade instead of Pokédollars. ==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || +25% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 2,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |1 || +50% to mutation rate || 50 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 5,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |2 || +75% to mutation rate || 150 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 10,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |3 || +100% to mutation rate || 250 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 20,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |4 || +125% to mutation rate || 500 mutations triggered || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{farmpoints}} |- |5/Max || +150% to mutation rate || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |} == Leveling Strategies == There are a few strategies on how to level up the Squirtbottle based on which berries you have unlocked. ====Occa/Kebia Planting Formation==== If you want to be able to gain experience more passively, then the best strategy is with Occa and Kebia berries. Colbur works for this as well, but takes longer enough to grow that is isn't as useful. This strategy will likely let you level up your Squirtbottle from 0 to 5 without having to set it up again unless you get unlucky with a full takeover. Note: When using this strategy, make sure to plant the berries so that they finish at the same time to lower the chance of full takeover. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] |- style="height: 26px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]

[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
[[Occa]] |} {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Occa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Kebia]] || 10 mins until ripe || 6 mins 40 secs until ripe || 4 mins 27 secs until ripe |} ====Sitrus/Kebia Planting Formation==== If you only have Kebia berries and neither of the other two, you can use Kebia and Sitrus at the same time in the following formation: Note: This will need to be set up every 20 minutes since both berries take 10 minutes to ripen, but you don't need to check on it more often than that. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Kebia.png|30px]]
[[Kebia]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]]
[[Sitrus]] |} ====Persim Planting Formation==== Another common strategy includes mutating [[Persim]] berries is you haven't unlocked Occa, Kebia, or Colbur yet. You can find the formation and timings on the [[Persim]] page. This is a very active strategy, but this setup should provide a little over 3.58 mutations per minute on average including time waiting for growth. This strategy is also the fastest, but needs at least about 4 and a half hours of active growth and mutation time to complete.
{{Oak items}}
[[Category:Oak Items]] [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Farm]]

{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Squirtbottle |image = [[File:Squirtbottle.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Squirtbottle''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Goldenrod City in [[Johto]] for 5,000 {{farmpoints}}) |effect = Increases the chance of [[Berry|berry]] mutations }} The '''Squirtbottle''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of [[Berry|mutations]] occurring in the [[Farm]]. {{Oak items}}

revision.comment: Adding Strategies for gaining experience for Squirtbottle
